children.subject:
Hi,

All IT systems and services hosted at the Campus Datacenter are expected to be available during this power outage per the FAQ page:

https://technology.berkeley.edu/pge-outage/faqs

Finsen
IT Manager
Instructional Support Group
EECS
inst@eecs.berkeley.edu

Note that things get dicy if this lasts beyond 48 hours. 

Campus DC is very likely without power but has generators in place -- as long as those get refueled things should be good. Critical bits (DNS, the Berkeley homepage etc have redundancy in San Diego).
Does anyone know if the power outage applies to the campus Data Center as well?

Hi,

Per internal communication from the Campus Network team, the core of the WiFi network is expected to be operational.  As long as the building/location still has power, the Network team expects the network at that building/location to continue to function.  On the other hand, if power is shut down to a building/location, network connectivity will be offline.

Finsen Chiu
IT Manager
Instructional Support Group
EECS
inst@eecs.berkeley.edu
Will wireless networks be up in campus buildings with backup power? (e.g. Sproul Hall)

history.content:
[Update 2019/10/11 Friday 6:30pm]

Campus has confirmed that power was fully restored.   All instructional servers, and computer lab operations have now been fully restored.  Please let us know if there are issues.
We appreciate your patience during this power outage.
Finsen Chiu
IT Manager
Instructional Support Group
EECS
inst@eecs.berkeley.edu

-------------------------------

Dear students,

Due to scheduled Campus power shutdown, and the cancellation of all classes on Wednesday 10/9, the Instructional Support Group will begin shutting down all instructional servers, and computer lab operations starting at 10pm Tuesday 10/8.  Users will not be able to access lab machines, instructional servers, and computer labs in Soda Hall/Cory Hall.  
Because of UCPD's "no occupancy" policy, please make sure to take your belongings when you leave, and stay away from Cory Hall and Soda Hall during this power outage.
We are expecting this power shutdown to last 48 hours, however, we will resume operations sooner if we hear confirmation of an early power restoration, and that it is safe to do so.
Finsen
IT Manager
Instructional Support Group
EECS
inst@eecs.berkeley.edu
history.subject: [NOTICE] Campus Power Shutdown 10/9 Wednesday
